articles.title: AllTrails debuts $80/year membership that includes AI-powered smart routes - TechCrunch
articles.description: AllTrails, the hiking and biking companion named 2023's iPhone App of the Year, is launching a new premium membership called 'Peak' that includes AI-powered features, trail conditions, heatmaps, and more.
articles.content: AllTrails, the hiking and biking companion that was named 2023’s iPhone App of the Year, is launching a new premium membership called “Peak” that includes an upgraded feature set. This $80-per-year s… [+3275 chars]

articles.title: Samsung launches Odyssey OLED G6: World’s first 500Hz OLED monitor at $1488 - VideoCardz.com
articles.description: Samsung Launches World’s First 500Hz OLED Gaming Monitor: Odyssey OLED G6 Company raises the bar for gaming displays with initial global rollout of Odyssey OLED G6. Monitor brings 0.03ms GTG response time and QHD resolution powered by QD-OLED technology. Sams…
